name: Waluigi: Set Sail (Demo 1)
description:
The first 3 worlds for a Waluigi FanGame. 

1: There are numerous issues with this game. Weird glitches sometimes. Also the health isn't shown. Oof.

2: Don't take this very seriously have fun with it.  Good Luck! 

3: Also c is controls. Your gonna wanna know that. (THIS IS IMPORTANT!!!!!) 

4: There isn't actually 50 stars. I chose a random number. Fight me.  

5: Also a message that says "Lighting needs to be Rebuilt" will be displayed. It can be gotten rid of though. Press ` Then type in "DisableAllScreenMessages". Then press >.  And then Enter. It should disappear. Sorry.
